Posts.Content: hi my name is shlomit, my sister is 23 years old and been diagnosed with breast cancer that send to the bones. we started treated with tamoxipen 6 weeks ago but the blood test show huge growth in the cancer markers. the doctore decide to stop with the hormonal treatment and we will start chemotherapy soon. i have no idea why the markers as grow so much. we heared about treatment in Germany with hyperthermia and we want to try this but i dont know any women in that condition that been treated with hyperthermia. my sister is young and we hopeless so well try almost enything. so please if someone heared about someone that been treated with hyperthermia i need any information i can get.

Posts.Title: 23 years old with breast cancer with bone metastasis

Posts.Content: hi everyone im from israel, my sister was diagnosed with breast cancer with bone metastasis, we started treatment with tamoxipen daily, aredia once in a month and lucrine every 3 months. the blood test show beafor we start this treatment this marcks: CA-15.3 : 128 CEA: 1028 now afret 6 weeks of treatment we did another blood test that show this marcks: CA-15.3 :240 CEA: 3880 how can this happen, shouldnt the hormonal treatment to stop the development of the disease?, and why the markers are grow up so much?! we now stop with the hormonal threatment and we soon begin with chemotherapy. can sameone tell me how can this happen, what should we do now?

Posts.Content: yes i have her pathology report. 60-70% are estrogen receptors positive and 30% are progesterone receptors positive
